1.0.name: wordpress/easy-social-icons
1.0.description:
If you need support to get this plugin installed or to have a customized version of the plugin please send us an email to this address contact@cybernetikz.com.

You can upload your own social icon, set your social URL, choose weather you want to display vertical or horizontal. You can use the shortcode [cn-social-icon] in page/post, template tag for php file also you can use the widget "Easy Social Icons" for sidebar.

Key Feature

  • You can upload your own social icons, set URL for that icon with sort order, target window etc.
  • You will get the add/edit/delete option for icons
  • You can set the icon width and height to fit in your template/design perfectly
  • You can display your social share icon vertically or horizontally to match perfectly with your template/design.
  • You can put your social icon set in the sideb
